dict.string: An application launched via WezTerm would like to access AppleScript.
An application launched via WezTerm would like to access calendar data.
An application launched via WezTerm would like to access the camera.
An application launched via WezTerm wants to access your contacts.
An application launched via WezTerm would like to access your location information, even in the background.
An application launched via WezTerm would like to access your location information.
An application launched via WezTerm would like to access your location information while active.
An application launched via WezTerm would like to access your microphone.
An application launched via WezTerm would like to access your reminders.
